message: Bob, I'm offering you this incredible product for $850,000. It's a fantastic deal considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is significant to you, but I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I am willing to pay $799,999 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $799,999 is just a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $825,000. This reflects the true value of the product while still leaving room for both of us to be satisfied.  Let's see if we can find common ground here.

I appreciate your response, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to increase my offer to $810,000 for the product. I hope this proposal will lead us closer to reaching an agreement that suits both of our interests.
